tool_description: Analyzes resume content for Applicant Tracking System compatibility, identifying formatting and content issues that could prevent proper parsing.

resume_text.description: Complete resume text content to analyze

target_ats_type.description: Target ATS type: workday, taleo, greenhouse, lever, or general

error_messages: Empty resume content: Provide resume text with actual content for ATS analysis.
Invalid ATS type: Use one of [workday, taleo, greenhouse, lever, general].
Content too short: Resume content insufficient for meaningful ATS compatibility analysis.
usage: Provide resume text and optionally specify target ATS type. The tool identifies compatibility issues and provides recommendations.

formatting_issues.description: List of formatting problems that could cause parsing issues

parsing_risks.description: Content elements that may not parse correctly

recommendations.description: Specific recommendations to improve ATS compatibility

critical_fixes.description: High-priority fixes that should be addressed first
